snippet: After bouts with grief, unemployment and homelessness, Elbert Copeland is starting anew by helping to beautify Lower Manhattan neighborhoods.
abstract: Elbert Copeland of Manhattan has received aid from Community Service Society of New York to help pay for monthly MetroCard that allows him to attend job training programs; society is one of seven agencies supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: After bouts with grief, unemployment and homelessness, Elbert Copeland is starting anew by helping to beautify Lower Manhattan neighborhoods.

headline.print_headline: An Opportunity to Improve His Surroundings, Along With His Fortunes
headline.main: A Chance to Improve the Community, and Himself
